title: Minisode: An Interview with "The Violin Conspiracy" Author Brendan Slocumb
itunes:title: Minisode: An Interview with "The Violin Conspiracy" Author Brendan Slocumb
description:
Today’s spoiler-free minisode includes a conversation between Kaytee and author Brendan Slocumb. Brendan is the author of The Violin Conspiracy, a coming-of-age and mystery novel rolled into one, and a book that captured me with every word. You’ve heard me gush about the book, now listen to my conversation with Brendan to hear about:

  • How much his main character overlaps with him

  • Growing up in a musical family

  • Writing a violin as a character

  • Naming inanimate objects

  • The real life racism situations

  • The teachers that influenced him and changed his life

  • Some strange facts about music competitions and instrument thieves

  • Being a GMA book club pick

  • Playing Carnegie Hall

  • The next project (and the next!)

  • Some Violin Conspiracy miniseries tidbits

  • And of course: a book he wants to press into your hands.

Minisode show notes are not timestamped, but linked titles are below for you to peruse. These are affiliate links, which kick back a small percentage of your purchase to the podcast, which helps support the show!

The Violin Conspiracy by Brendan Slocumb

How Music Can Save Your Life (Brendan’s Podcast)

Brendan playing Carnegie Hall

The Nickel Boys by Colson Whitehead

Connect with Brendan: on Instagram at @brendanslocumb, on Facebook, Twitter or at his website

Contact the show at currentlyreadingpodcast@gmail.com.

You can find Kaytee on Instagram @notesonbookmarks and Meredith @meredith.reads.

You can visit our website at www.currentlyreadingpodcast.com
